Name: FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION
Friendly_Message__c: Data quality issue. Please fix before saving record:

Name: REQUIRED_FIELD_MISSING
Friendly_Message__c: Required fields not filled out. Please fill out the following fields and try saving again:

Name: SObject row was retrieved via SOQL
Friendly_Message__c: A field was omitted from a SOQL statement:

Name: UNABLE_TO_LOCK_ROW
Friendly_Message__c: A trigger is trying to update a record that is currently being updated by another user. Please try again in a few minutes.

Name: Attempt to de-reference a null object
Friendly_Message__c: An apex trigger tried referencing an object that is empty.

Name: ENTITY_IS_DELETED
Friendly_Message__c: A trigger is trying to update a {{object}} record that has been deleted.

Name: General
Friendly_Message__c: Something happened when saving the record. Please contact your system administrator.
